stickyMessages.name: sticky-message
stickyMessages.description: Sticky Messages allow you to display a message at the bottom of a channel

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel to set the sticky message in

embed.name: embed
embed.description: Whether or not to send the message as an embed

modal.title: Sticky Messages
modal.label: Message
modal.placeholder: Enter your message here. It will always be displayed at the bottom of the channel.
